name: Particulares
additionalNotes:
Cigars:	Handmade.
Bands:	Standard band A, B.
Packaging:	Dress Box of 5 cigars in individual slide lid boxes.
Status:	A 1980 release. Discontinued 1987.
History:	Particulares were subsequently released as Limited Editions in 2000 and 2001, as a trial batch in late 2002/2003.
